@dickiepooh  The best player for that is PowerDVD. So my method is, Download and install ImgBurn, Daemon Tools. First, open ImgBurn and select "Create Iso from folder". Now just create an iso. Then open the iso file using daemon tools. Now, PowerDVD will detect a BluRay disc and will play it with everything.
Hope it helps. Good Luck.
